registration.heading: Patient Registration
registration.content: Today, %s patients were registered; %s patients new to the hospital, and %s returning.

cash.heading: HBB Cash Box
cash.content: %s were introduced at the Caisse Aux HBB, paid against a total of %s invoices.

subsidy.heading: IMA Subsidy
subsidy.content: The IMA subsidy was charged a total of %s enabling %s patients to receive health care.

sale.heading: Invoice
sale.content: %s invoice transactions were submitted consisting of %s line items, this include both hospitalised and outpatient invoices.

fiche.heading: Fiche Consultation
fiche.content: A total of %s charges were made for fiche consultations; %s for 'Nouvelle Fiche' and %s for 'Anciennce Fiche'.

alert_one.heading: Info
alert_one.content: Please note this is an automated report based on data captured by BHIMA. It is intended to provide transparent financial and system health information to the administration of IMCK. This message will not be shown again.

alert_two.heading: PAX
alert_two.content: BHIMA is currently being installed at PAX. Following reports will include data for the enterprise as a whole, including both HBB and PAX.
